forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain this morning. Breaks of sun this afternoon. High 23C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 73F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early then periods of showers late. Thunder possible. Low around 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Thunder possible. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 18C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 64F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 19C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High near 65F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
